metadata.feature_description: Visual indicators showing engagement trends with up/down arrows and warnings

steps.expected: Dashboard displays with trend indicators visible
steps.actual: Dashboard loaded successfully showing Community Health cards with star indicators (engagement-star class) for all modules

steps.expected: Trend indicators (star/warning icons) display correctly based on health status
steps.actual: Star icons (green stars) displayed next to metrics with 0% values, indicating good health status (healthStatus == 1). N/A displayed for metrics where data is not applicable.

steps.expected: Up/down arrows visible based on engagement progress
steps.actual: Green up arrow (percent-progress higher class) visible next to Engagement 0% statistic, correctly indicating trend direction

steps.action: Examine Community Health cards for warning indicators
steps.expected: Warning icons appear when healthStatus indicates concerning trends
steps.actual: All metrics show 0% with star indicators (good health) since there is no community activity data. Code review confirms engagement-warning class applies when healthStatus == -1. Currently no warning scenarios exist due to zero activity.

steps.action: Verify star icon colors in Community Health cards
steps.expected: Star icons display in green color for good health status
steps.actual: Green star icons visible on Community Health cards indicating good health status (0% problem areas)

steps.action: Verify up arrow color in Engagement section
steps.expected: Up arrow displays in green for positive/neutral trend
steps.actual: Green up arrow visible next to Engagement percentage, correctly styled via percent-progress higher CSS class

steps.action: Hover over star indicator on Community Health card
steps.actual: Hover action executed on star icon. The tooltip functionality is implemented via tag-menu div with CSS hover states. The code shows tooltips are generated via createComparativeTooltip function for percent-progress indicators.
Engagement statistics section visible with up arrow indicator. Tooltip content generated based on comparative term data showing trend comparison.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Validate trend persistence after period change

steps.action: Change Comparative Term dropdown from '1 w' to '1 m'
steps.expected: Data reloads and trend indicators persist with updated values
steps.actual: Comparative Term changed to '1 m' (1 month). Dashboard reloaded data and trend indicators (star icons, N/A values) persisted correctly after period change.

observations: All metrics display 0% because there is no community activity data in the test environment. This means we cannot observe 'warning' indicators (healthStatus == -1) or 'down' trend arrows in action, but the code implementation is verified to support these states.
Star icons (engagement-star) are visible and functioning correctly, appearing when healthStatus == 1 (good health).
N/A indicators are correctly displayed for Ideas module metrics that are not applicable (e.g., 'Ideas without change in status in over 2 weeks').
The percent-progress indicators with higher/lower CSS classes control the up/down arrows. The 'hidden' class is applied when progress == 0 (equal/no change).
Tooltips are implemented via the tag-menu div element and createComparativeTooltip function in the JavaScript code.
Code review confirms engagement images exist: icon-engagement-up.png, icon-engagement-down.png, icon-engagement-warning.png, icon-engagement-star.png
